Dynamic Programming: Dynamic programming is both a mathematical optimization method and a computer programming method. In both contexts it refers to simplifying a complicated problem by breaking it down into simpler sub-problems in a recursive manner.

files.sliding_window: Finding the largest sum of three contiguous number
files.max_sum_path: Finding the maximum sum in a path from (0, 0) to (N-1, M-1) when can only move to right or down
files.longest_increasing_subsequence: Find the length of the longest subsequence of a given sequence such that all elements of the subsequence are sorted in increasing order
files.max_subarray: Find the sum of the maximum Subarray in the given Array
